articles.author: Isaac Arnsdorf
articles.title: Trump touts $100B investment pledge from WeWork and FTX backer SoftBank - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump and Masayoshi Son, the CEO of Japanese investment firm SoftBank, promised to create thousands of American jobs. They made the same vow eight years ago, with mixed results.
articles.content: President-elect Donald Trump and a Japanese technology investor, SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son, announcedMonday that SoftBank would invest $100 billion in the United States, echoinga $50 billion pledge … [+369 chars]
